title.narrative: PGS Ghana was officially launched and the PGS Website operational in October 2020

description.narrative: The launch event and official operationalization of PGS Ghana were organized on 4 October 2020, where government officials and numerous stakeholders have been invited and participated in the event. In addition to the launch event, PGS Ghana is officially registered as an NGO is now looking to organize the AGM and has drafted its constitution. An Election Committee has been informed and the next elections are planned by the end of Year 4 operations.
